DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct evaluate effect rapid crystalloid ( Lactated Ringer 's solution ) colloid ( hydroxyethyl starch ; HES ) cohydration second intravenous access line incidence hypotension ephedrine requirement spinal anaesthesia caesarean section .
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Spinal anaesthesia caesarean delivery often associate hypotension . This study conduct evaluate effect rapid crystalloid ( Lactated Ringer 's solution ) colloid ( hydroxyethyl starch ; HES ) cohydration second intravenous access line incidence hypotension ephedrine requirement spinal anaesthesia caesarean section . Methods : We study 90 woman uncomplicated pregnancy undergo elective caesarean section spinal anaesthesia . Intravenous access establish two peripheral intravenous line , first use baseline volume infusion . Immediately induction spinal anaesthesia , Lactated Ringer 's solution ( Group L ) HES ( Group C ) infusion start maximal possible rate via second line group L C respectively . The third group ( Group E ) patient receive lactated Ringer 's solution 'keep vein open ' rate maintain double-blind nature . The incidence hypotension , ephedrine requirement , total amount volume side effect record .
DOC.criteria: elective caesarean section spinal anaesthesia Significant coexisting disease ; preeclampsia hepatorenal disease , Pregnancy preinduced hypertension , Being active labour require emergency caesarean section , Any contraindication regional anaesthesia local infection bleed disorder .
